Text: Hey. Im new to this site, just downloaded this stream, however I cant play the flac files on my computer, Do I have to download a special flac player? will these files play on my mp3 player?Please excuse my ignorance, I was born with an extra chromosone.
You can't player FLAC on itunes. You can use VLC media player or Winamp which can get them on your MP3 player. You can also download a FLAC codec and convert them to WAV and put them in itunes.
